project1.title: Sorting Hat
project1.description: This app sorts names from an input into one of four Hogwarts Houses.  It ueses a random number generater to assign each name to a number, and each number to a house.  Then it builds a card to display the data.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Bootstrap, Version Control with Github
